Uses of Package
events

  • Packages that use events 
    Package Description
    events
    Provides the classes necessary for the event system.
    events.gameview
    Provides all gameView events classes.
    events.gameview.gameState  
    events.gameview.global  
    events.gameview.startState  
    events.logic
    Provides all logic events classes.
    events.logic.endState  
    events.logic.gameState  
    events.logic.global  
    events.logic.startState  
    gameview
    Provides the classes necessary for the game view.
    gameview.eView
    Provides the classes necessary for the end state: End screen.
    gameview.gView
    Provides the classes necessary for the game state: Main window with map, figures, ...
    gameview.generalView  
    gameview.kIView  
    gameview.sView
    Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.
    logic
    Provides the classes necessary for the game logic.
    logic.figure  
    logic.player
